words.defineEn: allowable, acceptable, or valid, especially in a court of law

examples: When the tension on the top exceeds the maximum allowable tensile stress, it rips it in half and you're left with only two pieces of the rod left.

examples: The patient consented to be put under the knife to remove the tumor.
